original_title: Fedor: The Baddest Man On The Planet
overview: The documentary offers exclusive footage of Fedor's training, both inside his local boxing gym and his grueling outdoor workouts. "Fedor: Baddest Man on the Planet" also takes a look at the fighter's life in his hometown Stary Oskol, Russia and includes interviews with Fedor's mother, his priest, his friends and others who are intimately involved in his life. This footage has never been seen before and promises to give MMA fans an inside glimpse into MMA's biggest star.
title: Fedor: The Baddest Man On The Planet
